text: The Nissan Cube is a mini MPV that was built by the Nissan. The first Cube arrived in 1998. It entered its second generation in 2002. The third generation launched in 2008 and ended production without a replacement in December 2019. The assembly for the Nissan Cube was in Oppama, Japan. They were sold in Japan and North America, and additionally Europe for one year in 2010. ==Other websites== *Nissan Cube at nissan.ca Cube Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Nissan Cube
